title: Tribunal bans are o.p
body: lets get something straight at first i did rage a bit, got a couple bans. i thought tribunal was suppose to help. they did at first but if the littlest thing happens i get a ban :( , can you please make the bans guide lines a bit less. some people have problems with their computers and leaving the game after like 1 minute and u get a ban. please make it better

replies.body: There's no Tribunal for OCE (yet), I dunno what you're on about mate. Most likely you've been AFKing or leaving games, but if you're extremely toxic you might have been reviewed by a Rioter and manually banned.

Tribunal bans?

That would be leaver buster, and if your leaving games your ruining the game for other players.

Fix your %%%%.
